sentences.english: In recent years, it has been more serious of marriage crisis in migrant family.
sentences.chinese: 近年來，農民工家庭發生婚變的問題日趨嚴重。

sentences.english: Harlem Yu denies rumors about their marriage and said that he and Annie didn't separate or divorce.
sentences.chinese: 庾澄慶否認婚變傳言，稱與伊能靜未分居未離婚。

sentences.english: Two person of change of marital status hearsays are no wonder noisier are fiercer.
sentences.chinese: 難怪二人的婚變傳聞越鬧越烈。

sentences.english: The famous star's divorce was not known to the public until one year later.
sentences.chinese: 這位明星婚變的消息一年之後才被公開。
